DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect single dose sitagliptin glucose dependent insulin secretion use meal tolerance test ( MTT ) hyperglycemic clamp ( HCG ) procedure .
DOC.brief_title: A Method Evaluate Glucose-Dependent Insulin Secretion Healthy Males ( MK-0431-179 )
DOC.criteria: Subject Asian Indian male 18 45 year age Subject good health Subject nonsmoker use nicotinecontaining product six month Subject willing avoid strenuous activity Subject history stroke , seizure , major neurological disorder Subject irritable bowel disease recurrent nausea , vomit , diarrhea , abdominal pain Subject history high blood pressure require treatment Subject history cancer Subject history diabetes
